justifications: BRITAIN will soon boast the lowest corporation tax rate of any major economy, after chancellor George Osborne revealed plans to slash the rate from 20% to less than 15%.
"A further step in that direction would really turn the UK into a tax haven type of economy,\" he added.
"the UK is \"preparing itself to become a tax haven\" for multinationals, in a reaction to Google's \u00a3130m agreement with HMRC over unpaid back taxes."
"A further step in that direction would really turn the UK into a tax haven type of economy,\" he added.
"the UK is \"preparing itself to become a tax haven\" for multinationals, in a reaction to Google's \u00a3130m agreement with HMRC over unpaid back taxes."
Osborne stated that he wanted to create a \"super competitive economy\" through low taxes and by attracting further global investment, particularly from China.
